title: UK inflation expectations hit record high - Citi - Reuters
description: The British public's expectations for inflation in 12 months' time rose to a record high of 4.8% in January, according to a survey from YouGov and Citi.

title: JPMorgan, Citi staff to start 2022 with remote work - Reuters
description: JPMorgan Chase & Co (JPM.N) has offered its staff the option of working from home for the first two weeks of 2022, with a caveat that all employees are expected to return to office no later…

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Profits drop at JPMorgan, Citi but jump at Wells - Reuters.com
description: Quarterly profits fell at JPMorgan Chase and Citigroup, but they nearly doubled at Wells Fargo as banks kicked off earnings season Friday. Fred Katayama reports.

author: Zacks Equity Research
title: The Zacks Analyst Blog Highlights: Tilly's, Inc., Zumiez Inc., Citi Trends, Inc. and Genesco Inc
description: Tilly's, Inc., Zumiez Inc., Citi Trends, Inc. and Genesco Inc are included in this blog.

author: jbaron@insider.com (Jasmin Baron, CEPF)
title: The best credit card bonuses and deals this week include your last chance for a record-high bonus on the Citi Premier and a lower annual fee on the Amex Business Platinum
description: The 80,000-point bonus on the Citi Premier is ending, and it's your last chance to snag the Amex Business Platinum before the fee jumps this week.

author: johostetler@gmail.com (Joseph Hostetler)
title: The Citi Prestige has made its $250 annual travel credit more flexible for another year
description: Citi Prestige cardholders will see their $250 annual travel credit applied to eligible restaurant and supermarket purchases through December 31, 2022.

author: jbaron@insider.com (Jasmin Baron, CEPF)
title: The Citi Premier card is offering a record-high 80,000-point bonus, but it's your last chance to apply
description: The unprecedented bonus on the Citi Premier card is worth $800 in travel or cash back — and potentially more if you transfer points to partners.

author: jbaron@insider.com (Jasmin Baron, CEPF)
title: The Citi Double Cash card will soon stop earning cash back — but its new rewards currency is much more flexible
description: Starting March 2022, Citi Double Cash cardholders will earn points instead of cash back, and have more options for redeeming rewards.

author: rwangman@insider.com (Ryan Wangman, CEPF)
title: Citibank personal loans review: Loans with solid interest rates for existing Citi customers
description: Citibank personal loans aren't accessible to everyone. You need a Citi bank account for at least one year and a minimum income of $10,500 to qualify.

title: Citi to exit Mexican consumer banking business in strategy revamp - Reuters
description: Citigroup Inc (C.N) said on Tuesday that it will exit its Citibanamex consumer banking business in Mexico, ending a two-decade-long retail effort that was the last of its consumer banking ven…

title: Citi says Mexico consumer bank a 'jewel,' as it gears up to sell - Reuters
description: Citigroup Inc (C.N) described the Citibanamex consumer bank in Mexico it is planning to shed as a "jewel" as it gears up to be active with potential buyers in the coming months.

title: Mexican entrepreneur Garza Calderon confirms interest in Citi asset sale - Reuters
description: Mexican entrepreneur Javier Garza Calderon aims to bid on the consumer banking arm of Citigroup (C.N) in the country, pledging to return it to Mexican hands, he said in a statement Sunday.

title: Mexico eyes antitrust on Citi deal, expects plenty of interest for assets - Reuters
description: Mexico's government said on Wednesday it would keep a close eye on excess market concentration as U.S. bank Citigroup (C.N) sells its consumer banking business in Mexico, and said the divestm…

author: Catie Keck
title: Merry Christmas! Santander Claus made a $176 million payment mistake
description: Tens of thousands of people woke up on Christmas Day to doubled wages and a higher-than-expected bank balance after Santander mistakenly deposited £130 million ($176 million) into accounts held by its UK customers

title: Citigroup hires Mike Dunlap as head of North America oil trading - Reuters
description: Citigroup Inc (C.N) has hired veteran trader Mike Dunlap as head of North America oil trading, according to his LinkedIn profile and a source familiar with the matter.

title: BUZZ Australia's Megaport slumps most in 15 months after downbeat results - Reuters
description: ** Network operator Megaport Ltd (MP1.AX) slumps as much as 15.1% to A$15.52, its biggest intraday drop since October 2020
